title: The Brain and The Mind - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 8/24/22
itunes:title: The Brain and The Mind - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 8/24/22
description:
George Noory and author Joseph Selbie discuss his research into the brain's influence on our thoughts, emotions and behavior, how meditation can help improve the mind's focus, and if the concept of God is only a mental creation.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
